content.en_US: Important progression fluid which allows the production of [[hard plastic|Hard Plastic]] and [[fullerene|Fullerene]]. Obtained in the [[fractioning tower|Fractioning Tower]] from [[reformate|Reformate]] or [[desulfurized napthta|Desulfurized Napthta]]. BTX can be [[cracked|Cracked]] to obtain [[aromatic hydrocarbons|Aromatic Hydrocarbons]] and [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]].
